summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement with the Seattle Chinatown-International District Preservation and Development Authority to provide financial assistance for the purchase of the Bush Hotel, 621 South Jackson Street, the development of a self-sustaining community center therein, and the renovation of the residential units in the upper floors to implement the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for Fiscal Year 1978; and making an appropriation from the Federal Shared Revenue Fund therefor.
